title: Interactive Cad & Cae
description: Principles of geometric modeling and finite-element method; interactive CAD and CAE software tools. CAD and CAE applications in thermal and mechanical design problems. Design projects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 3180 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3345 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
